allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(docs\): initialize Docusaurus site for robotics textbook

Set up complete Docusaurus 3.x documentation platform with:
- Four-module curriculum structure \(ROS2, Simulation, NVIDIA Isaac, VLA\)
- Custom React components \(CoverSection, ModulesScrollytelling\)
- GitHub Actions deployment workflow
- Local search and image optimization plugins
- Hardware requirements and appendix sections
- Project specifications and task tracking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs\(content\): add complete Module 3 - The AI-Robot Brain textbook content

Add comprehensive textbook content for Module 3 covering NVIDIA Isaac
platform for AI-powered robotics:

- Module 3 index with learning path and prerequisites
- Chapter 1: Isaac Sim \(Omniverse, USD, synthetic data, ROS 2 bridge\)
- Chapter 2: Isaac ROS \(NITROS, GPU perception, object detection, depth\)
- Chapter 3: Visual SLAM \(cuVSLAM, map building, localization\)
- Chapter 4: Nav2 Integration \(costmaps, planners, controllers, behavior trees\)

Each chapter includes:
- Learning objectives and conceptual explanations
- Production-ready code examples \(Python, YAML, XML\)
- Architecture diagrams and troubleshooting sections
- Hands-on exercises with starter code and solutions

Total: ~4,700 lines of professional technical content.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from src.main import app; print\(''Backend imports OK''\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from src.main import app; print\(''Backend with translate endpoint OK''\)")
